player_interaction.action: Face the player, play greeting dialogue, offer tasks if available.
Briefly pause work to acknowledge the player, then resume work unless a task handoff occurs.

City Hall.on_arrival: Mayor begins work; may generate administrative tasks.
City Hall.on_leave: Mayor posts summary tasks to mailbox.

Post Office.on_arrival: Postmaster starts sorting mail and packages; generates delivery tasks.
Post Office.on_leave: Postmaster closes post office and sets new tasks for next day.

Commercial.on_arrival: Shopkeeper opens shop; interacts with customers; may generate restocking tasks.
Commercial.on_leave: Shopkeeper reconciles sales and posts supply requests.

Utilities.on_arrival: Maintenance Chief checks utilities; performs repairs; posts maintenance tasks.
Utilities.on_leave: Logs repairs and posts follow‑up tasks.

Residential.on_arrival: Resident performs household tasks or errands; may post personal requests.

task_generation.description: Generate mail delivery task for players to collect and deliver packages.
Generate repair or maintenance tasks for utilities and residential buildings.
Generate tasks to help restock shelves or deliver goods to customers.
Schedule meetings or administrative tasks requiring the player's participation.

social_interaction.default: During social periods (usually midday), NPCs wander near their current location and engage in short dialogues with nearby NPCs.
